Name: Description
Families with Children in Homeless Shelt: The number of families in Department of Homeless Services family shelters as of June 30th (the last month of the city fiscal year), by their last community district of residence. This indicator tells us how many families are experiencing homelessness, regardless of when they entered shelter.

Name: Source Notes
Families with Children in Homeless Shelt: New York City Department of Homeless Services, unpublished data (Fiscal Years 2017 & 2018).

Name: Notes
Families with Children in Homeless Shelt:
The rate represents the number of families entering DHS family shelters per 1,000 households. 
In the 2018 Community Risk Ranking, CCC began using this indicator in our Community Risk Ranking to replace the indicator Families Entering Homeless Shelters, for which community district data has been unavailable since 2015.
